attributes.action: Abolish the proposed congestion charging of commuter routes around Greater Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed policy of charging commuters to use the main arterial routes in and out of Manchester City Centre is wrong. A commuter route charge would unfairly penalise those who live and work in areas that are not directly served by public transport links, which is a common problem within the city. The impact of this charge is completely unforseen by the city council and will result in a decline in business and lifeastyle opportunities for companies and employees alike.
